00033 
00034 #define SO_END_STRIP_INDEX (-1)
00035 
00036 class COIN_DLL_API SoIndexedTriangleStripSet : public SoIndexedShape {
00037   typedef SoIndexedShape inherited;
00038 
00039   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoIndexedTriangleStripSet);
00040 
00041 public:
00042   static void initClass(void);
00043   SoIndexedTriangleStripSet(void);
00044 
00045   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00046   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00047   virtual SbBool generateDefaultNormals(SoState * state, SoNormalBundle * nb);
00048 
00049 protected:
00050   virtual ~SoIndexedTriangleStripSet();
00051 
00052   virtual SbBool generateDefaultNormals(SoState * state, SoNormalCache * nc);
00053   virtual void generatePrimitives(SoAction * action);
00054 
00055 private:
00056   enum Binding {
00057     OVERALL = 0,
00058     PER_STRIP,
00059     PER_STRIP_INDEXED,
00060     PER_TRIANGLE,
00061     PER_TRIANGLE_INDEXED,
00062     PER_VERTEX,
00063     PER_VERTEX_INDEXED
00064   };
00065 
00066   void countPrimitives(int & strips, int & tris);
00067   Binding findMaterialBinding(SoState * const state) const;
00068   Binding findNormalBinding(SoState * const state) const;
00069 };
